content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1481531763691{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Air Duct Inspection, Cleaning & Repair” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”The ductwork in your home travels through every room, keeping you and your loved ones comfortable year-round. However, over time, this space becomes dirty and potentially pushes dirt, odors, mold, indoor air pathogens, and other undesirable things into every room of your house. Fortunately, United Home Services offers professional ductwork cleaning to prevent this from happening and to help your family breathe easy again!” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:14px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”Schedule an air duct inspection and cleaning to get your HVAC system running efficiently. Call 800.399.4248″ font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left|color:%234169e1″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:tel%3A8003994248|||”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”16155″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1522668250439{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Do I Need My Ducts Cleaned?” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Reason 1: Efficiency

– Besides keeping your home free of dust, overall cleaner, and reducing indoor air pathogens, ductwork cleaning helps your HVAC system run with increased efficiency. As dirt and debris collects in ductwork, it can block passageways and cause your air conditioning and heating units to work harder than needed. So, dirty ducts can cause an increase in your energy bills and cause increased wear on your HVAC system.

Reason 2: Indoor Air Quality

– Besides costing you more money, dirty ducts can also be a health concern. Those with asthma, allergies, or certain illnesses might find themselves struggling to breathe in a home with dirty ducts. Collections of dust, mold, dirt, and allergens are the main culprits for duct-related health concerns.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”How Often Should My Ducts Get Cleaned?” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Contaminants will gather at different speeds depending on usage and location, so United Home Services suggests having your ducts inspected or cleaned every three to five years. The Environmental Protection Agency suggests that homeowners have their ducts inspected by a professional HVAC technician.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”25″ equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1523303178695{margin-bottom: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_id=”promo-section”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1535150504024{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://ushometownservices.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/187098112.jpg?id=16175) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”]

[vc_custom_heading text=”Air Duct Special ” font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:18px|text_align:left|color:%234169e1″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1611949511996{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}” link=”url:%2Fspecial-offers%2F|||”][vc_raw_html el_class=”price-line”]JTNDcCUzRSUzQ3NwYW4lM0UlM0NzdHJvbmclM0UxNSUyNSUyME9mZiUzQyUyRnN0cm9uZyUzRSUzQyUyRnNwYW4lM0UlM0MlMkZwJTNF[/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Air Duct Cleaning & Inspection
Unlimited Vents *One Furnace” font_container=”tag:h5|font_size:13px|text_align:left|color:%23474b4f|line_height:20px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:%2Fspecial-offers%2F|||”]
Call 800.399.4248[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1526456211600{padding-top: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”special-offers-subscribe”][vc_row_inner el_class=”crea-primary-background” css=”.vc_custom_1480597146707{padding-top: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1480597217017{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Receive Special Offers” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:36px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1523302976452{margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;padding-right: 16px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Sign up for our Newsletter to receive Special Offers.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:13px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:20px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522953405159{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”]

    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
